newsitem.title: USA: United Illuminating says ESOP to buy shrs.
newsitem.headline: United Illuminating says ESOP to buy shrs.

text.p: United Illuminating Co said Thursday its employee stock ownership plan intends to buy about 575,000 shares of common stock with a loan of up to $15 million from the company.
The company said it has filed an application with the Connecticut Department of Public Utility Control requesting permission to loan the money to the ESOP.
The company said the shares would be held in the ESOP fund and allocated to company employees' accounts over time as the loan is repaid.
The company said this move is in line with its obligation to contribute common stock to its employee accounts in the ESOP.
The company said financing will depend on approvals from the state and its board of directors.
